meanings.sent1: Her hungrinesses grew as she smelled the delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The children's hungrinesses were satisfied after a hearty meal.
meanings.sent3: His hungrinesses were so intense, he even dreamed of food.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked bread awakened her hungrinesses.
meanings.sent5: The growling of his stomach loudly announced his hungrinesses.

meanings.definition: The feeling of needing or wanting food.
meanings.sent1: The hungrinesses in her belly made her rush to the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The delicious smell in the air only intensified their hungrinesses.
meanings.sent3: His hungrinesses were so strong, he could almost taste the food from afar.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the cake triggered her hungrinesses instantly.
meanings.sent5: The growling of his stomach loudly announced his hungrinesses.

meanings.definition: A strong desire or craving for food.
meanings.sent1: The aroma of freshly baked cookies sparked her hungrinesses.
meanings.sent2: Their hungrinesses led them to raid the fridge late at night.
meanings.sent3: His hungrinesses were so intense, he even considered eating the leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The thought of ice cream created instant hungrinesses in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The growling of his stomach loudly announced his hungrinesses.
